name: Miriel's Enchanted Mystery HD
description:
Miriel returns in an exciting sequel!

REVIEWS

"All in all, Miriel’s Enchanted Mystery truly shines as a time management gem and for this reason, featured in appSIZED's Top Ten Game Picks for 2010"
-appsized.com

"Overall, I highly recommend Miriel's Enchanted Mystery (MEM) for fans and non-fans of the time management games." -wirebot (9.5/10)

"Ultra Recommended" -casualexplosion.com

"If you're a fan of time management, you'll likely enjoy Miriel's Enchanted Mystery" -jayisgames.com

DESCRIPTION

Find out what's the story behind the mysterious egg artifact and journey through four unique locations.

Bake bread and cakes, make potions and colored cloth, and many other exciting products. Use powerful spells to complete your tasks and buy more products and skills from the shop.

Miriel's Enchanted Mystery is bristling with entertaining choices!

Also check out the first Miriel-game: Miriel the Magical Merchant

Trailer: http://bit.ly/mirielem_video
